Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Large - scale RNA differential display technology applied to these cell lines identified several differentially expressed genes , including an alpha carbonic anhydrase gene , termed CA12 .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Alpha carbonic anhydrase gene (CA12) |

In this paragraph, the term "disease" is used to refer to the condition or disorder associated with the gene identified through the RNA differential display technology. In this case, the disease is "Alpha carbonic anhydrase gene (CA12)."
